title: Nick Cannon said he’d remarry Mariah Carey – this is what she had to say
text:
Nick Cannon said he’d remarry Mariah Carey – this is what she had to say

Cape Town - Mariah Carey and Nick Cannon disappointed many of their fans when they officially ended their marriage in 2016, but it seems Nick Cannon is willing to give it another go.

Speaking on T.I’s expediTIously with Tip "TI" Harris podcast, Nick revealed that he wouldn’t mind remarrying the singer.

"Honestly, I said I would probably never get married again because I’m still working on myself and trying to become a better man. But if I had to, I already know what that’s like; I would go back home first before I had to do it again," he said.

"If she say we going to the moon, I'd say, 'Let's go," he continued.

Unfortunately for the comedian, it looks like Mariah does not share the same sentiments.

Responding to TMZ’s question about the possibility of Nick and her rekindling their romance, Mariah said Nick was "being silly" before giving a fiery response.

"Remarrying? He’s making this up. This is him being silly," she said.

And when the paparazzo asked whether she was considering being single forever, she clapped back, "What is he? My last hope?"

Yikes!
description: Mariah Carey and Nick Cannon disappointed many of their fans when they officially ended their marriage in 2016.
